pages.text: Damage, attack speed, movement speed and knockback resistance are buffed with each kill. The higher the effect's level, the higher the buff. Not scoring a kill in 10 seconds will debuff you instead.

pages.title: Stacking Effect
pages.text: Getting a level of Frenzy will instead stack additional Levels on top of existing ones, increasing the effect's Potency instead of resetting its duration.
